name: Chain Destruction Harvest
description:
Chain Destruction Harvest ⛓💥⛏

A simple shooter where you have to chain-shoot the red cubey dudes before they shoot you! Released as an entry to the Godot Wild Jam #12, August 2019.

The red cubey dudes have taken you to their... red... cubey... lair! Shoot them in sequence, then use your powers to drag them together and destroy them. Finally harvest the "chips" held within them to win the game.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Camera: Mouse

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Drag together chained enemies: Right Mouse Button

Price

Would recommend downloading for free; it's only a quick prototype. Don't feel bad! However any donations would be very much appreciated and will win you a credit in future projects ;)

Special Thanks
